io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay

Class Grid<T extends Tile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.Grid<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VisualGrid

    public abstract class Grid<T extends Tile>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    A class to represent location of things on the board. Visualization classes can extend this to actually show things!
